rukus.text: 51|24|Apanara kache ibarahimera sam'manita mehamanadera brttanta eseche ki
51|25|yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’. Uttare tini balalena, ‘salama’. Era to aparicita loka [1].
51|26|Atahpara ibarahima tara strira kache druta cupisare gelena [1] ebam ekati mota-taja go-bachura (bhaja) niye asalena
51|27|atahpara tini ta tadera samane rekhe balalena, ‘tomara ki khabe na?’
51|28|Ete tadera samparke tara mane bhitira sancara hala [1]. Tara balala, ‘bhita habena na.’ Ara tara take eka jnani putra santanera susambada dila.
51|29|Takhana tara stri citkara karate karate sam'mukhe asala ebam tara gala capariye balala, ‘brd'dha-bandhya’ [1]
51|30|tara balala, ‘apanara raba erupa'i balechena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna.
51|31|Ibarahima balalena, ‘he prerita pheresatagana! Tomadera bisesa kaja [1] ki?’
51|32|Tara balala, ‘niscaya amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
51|33|Yate tadera upara niksepa kari matira sakta dhela
51|34|ya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya cihnita apanara rabera kacha theke [1].’
51|35|Atahpara sekhane yesaba mumina chila amara taderake bera kare niye asalama.
51|36|Tabe amara sekhane ekati paribara chara ara kono musalima pa'ini.
51|37|Ara yara marmambhada sastike bhaya kare amara tadera jan'ya okhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi.
51|38|Ara nidarsana rekhechi musara brttante'o, yakhana amara take spasta pramanasaha phira’a'unera kache pathalama [1]
51|39|takhana se ksamatara ahankare mukha phiriye nila [1] ebam balala, ‘e byakti haya eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada.’
51|40|Kaje'i amara take o tara dalabalake sasti dilama ebam tadera sagare niksepa karalama, ara se chila tiraskrta.
51|41|Ara nidarsana rayeche ‘adera ghatanate'o, yakhana amara tadera birud'dhe prerana karechilama akalyanakara bayu [1]
51|42|eta ya kichura upara diye baye giyechila take'i yena parinata karala curna-bicurna dhbansastupe.
51|43|Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera brttante'o, yakhana taderake bala hayechila, ‘bhoga kare na'o ekati nidrsta kala.’
51|44|Atahpara tara tadera rabera adesa manate ahankara karala; phale taderake pakara'o karala bajra [1] ebam tara ta dekhachila.
51|45|Atahpara tara uthe damrate parala na ebam pratirodha karate'o parala na.
51|46|Ara (dhbansa karechilama) edera age nuhera sampradayake, niscaya tara chila phaseka sampradaya.
